ai.greeting: Hello! I'm your AI financial advisor. How can I help you today?

savings.excellent: Excellent! You're saving ₹{savings} this month, which is {rate}% of your income. Keep up the great work!

savings.needs_improvement: You're saving ₹{savings} this month, which is {rate}% of your income. Try to increase your savings rate to at least 20% by reducing non-essential expenses.

ai.top_expense: Your highest spending category this month is {category} with ₹{amount}. Consider reviewing if this aligns with your budget goals.
ai.no_expenses: No expenses recorded this month yet.

overspend.category: You've overspent on {category} this month. Current spending: ₹{current}, Budget limit: ₹{limit}. You're ₹{overspend} over budget.
overspend.within_budget: Great! You're within budget for {category} this month.

investment.recommendation: For ₹{amount}, I recommend {type} (₹{amount} allocation). Risk level: {risk}. {description} Expected return: {return}.

savings_projection.projection: If you reduce {category} spending by {percent}%, your monthly savings would increase from ₹{current} to ₹{projected} (₹{increase} more).

income.analysis: Your total income this month is ₹{income}. This is a good foundation for building savings and investments.

expense.analysis: Your total expenses this month are ₹{expenses}. Review your spending patterns to identify areas for improvement.
